alert.note: Alert for Marion (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 07 at 7:52PM EST until March 09 at 5:31AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Cleveland OH has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Ohio... Scioto River Near Larue affecting Marion County. For the Scioto River...including Larue, Prospect...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Scioto River Near Larue. * WHEN...Until early Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Flooding occurs in lowland areas south of the Village of La Rue. Roads inundated include High Street, Larue Prospect Road, and parts of Vine Street. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM EST Monday the stage was 11.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 12.5 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Tuesday morning by 600 AM EST.
